title: Masonboro Island is a wonderful place to relax. But it does have rules for its visitors. The first one posted on the sign is that dogs must be on leashes. This is for human safety and for the protection of flora and fauna. Very few visitors with dogs have them on leashes. Most people just let them run wild. They sometimes fight and run in packs. Why doesn\'t the Sheriff patrol the island during the summer? Fines would offset the salary of the patrol?
